text: (he nabee!) aap kah den ki allaah kee aagya ka paalan karo tatha rasool kee aagya ka paalan karo aur yadi ve vimukh hon, to aapaka kartavy keval vahee hai, jisaka bhaar aapapar rakha gaya hai aur tumhaara vah hai, jisaka bhaar tumapar rakha gaya hai aur rasool ka daayitv keval khula aadesh pahuncha dena hai
